metadata.title: CVE-2024-21733 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information vulnerabilityin Apache Tomcat.This issue affects Apache Tomcat: from 8.5.7 through8.5.63, from 9.0.0-M11 through 9.0.43. Users are recommended to upgrade toversion 8.5.64 onwards or 9.0.44 onwards, which contain a fix for theissue.

criterions.comment: tomcat6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat7 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
